start:
Welcome to the Telegram bot!
It has been created to help you find the dream tour. Enjoy!
If you are looking for a tour, please click the 'Find tour' button and to change language click the 'Choose language'.
Thanks for joining!
startAgain:
Hi again, ${name}!🙂
If you are looking for a tour, please click the 'Find tour' button and to change language click the 'Choose language'.

validate.roleDeny: you dont have access with role: ${role}
validate.noRole: Please set role to to this action

createTour.peopleCount: 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 How many adults and children are there going to be? For example: '2 a 2 c'.
createTour.dateFrom: ✈️ Choose the start day of the tour
createTour.dateTo: Choose the end date of the tour ✈️
createTour.price: 💸 How much money are you ready to spend for your trip? For example: '- 200' or '200 -' or '200 - 500'
createTour.comment: Please leave comment if you want to ask something
createTour.finish: Thank you so much for your time! Have a nice day. 😊

choose.country: 🌆 What country and city do you want to go to? For example: 'France, Paris'.
choose.role: Choose one of the possible role.
choose.currency: Choose what currency are you going to pay.
